title: Did Democratic Eric Swalwell refer to weapons owners who resist confiscation?
subtitle: The websites of the conservatives and commentators turned on a tweet that the Democratic Congressman insisted was no more than a joke.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In November 2018, the Democratic Representative of the United States of America, Eric Swalwell, proposed the launching of nuclear weapons against the owners who had refused to deliver or sell semi-automatic rifles to the United States Government.
